docs.title: Senior Database Developer Path
docs.text: Welcome to the comprehensive guide for becoming a Senior Database Developer. This resource focuses on PostgreSQL and MySQL, covering everything from fundamental concepts to advanced techniques.

docs.title: How to Use This Guide
docs.text:
1. Start with the fundamentals section
  2. Complete all practical exercises
  3. Test your knowledge with provided questions
  4. Work through real-world scenarios
  5. Participate in discussions via GitHub issues

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Choose a section from the navigation menu to begin your learning journey.
